label: Telegram to J. Palmer Gaillard from Isaiah Bennett
description: Telegram to J. Palmer Gaillard from Isaiah Bennett notifying Gaillard of the twelve discharged employees and asking for intervention on their behalf.

metadata.label: Description
metadata.value: Telegram to J. Palmer Gaillard from Isaiah Bennett notifying Gaillard of the twelve discharged employees and asking for intervention on their behalf.

metadata.label: Transcript
metadata.value:
JO MAR 17 717P EST
577-3732
CHARLESTON SOCAR

HON [HONORABLE] J PAlMER GILLIARD

CITY HALL
CONFERENCE WITH DR WILLIAM MCCORD AND EMPLOYEES
AT THE MEDICAL COLLEGE HOSPITAL WHICH WAS ARRANGED
BV YOU HAVE RESULTED IN 12 DISCHARGES AND
INTIMIDATION OF OTHERS WE ARE HOPING THAT THE
DISCHARGED EMPLOYEES WILL BE REINSTATED IMMEDIATELY
ANY INTERVENTION FROM YOU IN DESOLVING [sic] THIS MATTER
WOULD BE APPRECIATED

LOCAL 1199B
655 EAST BAY ST
ISAIAH BENNETT STATE
DIRECTOR MISS MARY
MOULTRIE [SECRETARY]
